channel.title: Pony horses on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Pony horses on Game6r

item.title: My Little Pony Winter Fashion 2
item.description: Twilight Sparkle was instructed to complete an important mission and you need to help the horse cope with the task. She is attacked by winged enemies that need to be shot at. Your task is to get rid of all enemies on the level. Try not to let enemies close to you, otherwise they can take away health points.

item.title: Rainbow Pony Caring
item.description: Rainbow Dash came to your hair salon to get a new haircut. You need to show all your skills to style her mane and achieve a cool result. You can use any tools: scissors, comb, hair dryer, curling iron. A huge number of hair dyes are also available.
